- [連結器選項](../../build/reference/linker-options.md)

- [模組定義 (.def) 檔](../../build/reference/module-definition-dot-def-files.md)

- [延遲載入 DLL 的連結器支援](../../build/reference/linker-support-for-delay-loaded-dlls.md)
